alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 8:27PM CDT until July 19 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Taylor County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Sheldon, or 24 miles southeast of Ladysmith, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported tree damage in Bloomer, WI at 800 pm. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Taylor County, including the following locations... Polley, Gilman, Perkinstown, The Miller Dam Flowage, Lublin, Hannibal and Kathryn Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
